page.title: 08FARMING. (CONT. ON PAGE 9)
page.content: This 12sq.km.block has approx. 9 sq.km.(2224 acres) of{ARABLE FARMLAND. Holdings vary from several hundred acres to smallish fields. Some smaller farms have been combined into massive single acreages by hedge removal which with spraying has almost eradicated local flora and fauna. { BEET}is a major crop in this area and is grown according to quotas set by the Sugar Corporation and paid for on a sliding scale set by the quality and quantity produced. In late autumn the roads are busy with beet lorries en route to the "Bury" process plant. Crops are rotated on a three year basis (sugar, corn, corn). Although the main crops are{BEET, WHEAT}and {BARLEY}there is some rape grown and some peas for seed. Small scale production of{SOFT FRUIT}etc is often sold on a "pick it yourself" basis.
